claim: None of the Student_Club members who went to the Women's Soccer event want a T-shirt in Medium size.
extra_info: Women's Soccer is an event name; T-shirt that is in medium size refers to t_shirt_size = 'Medium'
reasoning: The claim states that none of the members who attended the Women's Soccer event want a Medium t-shirt. However, the database shows 7 members (Luisa Guidi, Edwardo Ing, Maya Mclean, Adele Deleon, Dean O'Reilly, Adela O'Gallagher, and Rafi Mckee) who attended the Women's Soccer event and have t_shirt_size = 'Medium'.

content.thinking: Let me explore the database schema and then verify the claim.

content.content:
attendance  event       income      member    
budget      expense     major       zip_code

tool_use_result.stdout:
attendance  event       income      member    
budget      expense     major       zip_code

content.content:
CREATE TABLE event
(
    event_id   TEXT
        constraint event_pk
            primary key,
    event_name TEXT,
    event_date TEXT,
    type       TEXT,
    notes      TEXT,
    location   TEXT,
    status     TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE major
(
    major_id   TEXT
        constraint major_pk
            primary key,
    major_name TEXT,
    department TEXT,
    college    TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE zip_code
(
    zip_code    INTEGER
        constraint zip_code_pk
            primary key,
    type        TEXT,
    city        TEXT,
    county      TEXT,
    state       TEXT,
    short_state TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "attendance"
(
    link_to_event  TEXT,
    link_to_member TEXT,
    primary key (link_to_event, link_to_member),
    foreign key (link_to_event) references event(event_id),
    foreign key (link_to_member) references member(member_id)
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "budget"
(
    budget_id     TEXT
            primary key,
    category      TEXT,
    spent         REAL,
    remaining     REAL,
    amount        INTEGER,
    event_status  TEXT,
    link_to_event TEXT,
    foreign key (link_to_event) references event(event_id)
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "expense"
(
    expense_id          TEXT
            primary key,
    expense_description TEXT,
    expense_date        TEXT,
    cost                REAL,
    approved            TEXT,
    link_to_member      TEXT,
    link_to_budget      TEXT,
    foreign key (link_to_budget) references budget(budget_id),
    foreign key (link_to_member) references member(member_id)
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "income"
(
    income_id      TEXT
        constraint income_pk
            primary key,
    date_received  TEXT,
    amount         INTEGER,
    source         TEXT,
    notes          TEXT,
    link_to_member TEXT,
    foreign key (link_to_member) references member(member_id)
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "member"
(
    member_id     TEXT
        constraint member_pk
            primary key,
    first_name    TEXT,
    last_name     TEXT,
    email         TEXT,
    position      TEXT,
    t_shirt_size  TEXT,
    phone         TEXT,
    zip           INTEGER,
    link_to_major TEXT,
    foreign key (link_to_major) references major(major_id),
    foreign key (zip) references zip_code(zip_code)
);

CREATE TABLE event
(
    event_id   TEXT
        constraint event_pk
            primary key,
    event_name TEXT,
    event_date TEXT,
    type       TEXT,
    notes      TEXT,
    location   TEXT,
    status     TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE major
(
    major_id   TEXT
        constraint major_pk
            primary key,
    major_name TEXT,
    department TEXT,
    college    TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE zip_code
(
    zip_code    INTEGER
        constraint zip_code_pk
            primary key,
    type        TEXT,
    city        TEXT,
    county      TEXT,
    state       TEXT,
    short_state TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "attendance"
(
    link_to_event  TEXT,
    link_to_member TEXT,
    primary key (link_to_event, link_to_member),
    foreign key (link_to_event) references event(event_id),
    foreign key (link_to_member) references member(member_id)
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "budget"
(
    budget_id     TEXT
            primary key,
    category      TEXT,
    spent         REAL,
    remaining     REAL,
    amount        INTEGER,
    event_status  TEXT,
    link_to_event TEXT,
    foreign key (link_to_event) references event(event_id)
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "expense"
(
    expense_id          TEXT
            primary key,
    expense_description TEXT,
    expense_date        TEXT,
    cost                REAL,
    approved            TEXT,
    link_to_member      TEXT,
    link_to_budget      TEXT,
    foreign key (link_to_budget) references budget(budget_id),
    foreign key (link_to_member) references member(member_id)
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "income"
(
    income_id      TEXT
        constraint income_pk
            primary key,
    date_received  TEXT,
    amount         INTEGER,
    source         TEXT,
    notes          TEXT,
    link_to_member TEXT,
    foreign key (link_to_member) references member(member_id)
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "member"
(
    member_id     TEXT
        constraint member_pk
            primary key,
    first_name    TEXT,
    last_name     TEXT,
    email         TEXT,
    position      TEXT,
    t_shirt_size  TEXT,
    phone         TEXT,
    zip           INTEGER,
    link_to_major TEXT,
    foreign key (link_to_major) references major(major_id),
    foreign key (zip) references zip_code(zip_code)
);

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/student_club.sqlite" "SELECT m.member_id, m.first_name, m.last_name, m.t_shirt_size FROM member m JOIN attendance a ON m.member_id = a.link_to_member JOIN event e ON a.link_to_event = e.event_id WHERE e.event_name = 'Women''s Soccer' AND m.t_shirt_size = 'Medium';"
